name: Monster Stalker Prologue Demo
description:
Monster Stalker Prologue Demo, a turn-based deck build strategy game, combines card battle and RPG. Players will fight monsters and get stronger, building deck with various card combos. 

Demo includes:

The early stage story

50+ cards with various features

10+ challenging battles

6+ deck build strategies

1+ hours gameplay time

I've developed it by myself for more than a year. Now the game demo is ready. Wish you like it and feel free to leave your feedback!

The formal version of Prologue including more monsters, battles and cards will be released in this Summer.

You can also find me on: Twitter
